name: Maida Barfi Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Maida Barfi Recipe: Flour ½ kg Sugar ground 1cup Cardamom ground ½ tsp Clarified butter 250gm Cashew nut 100gm Almonds pistachios 100gm Milk ½ cup Condensed milk 1tin Silver paper 2 Nutmeg pinch
instructions: Heat clarified butter and roast flour and remove , in a frying pan. Add condensed milk , sugar , milk and cardamom cook well. Now mix in flour , add almonds , pistachios. Now place it in grease tray and sprinkle cashew , lastly cut and serve .
